content: Black Myth: Wukong hides plenty of mysteries, but not all of its secrets and mechanics are easy to figure out. That's why we've compiled a list of how-to guides to help you figure out everything from upgrading your healing to finding secret areas, and unlocking special bosses
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How-to_Guides.md", under the primary heading "How-to Guides". The content is presented below:

Black Myth: Wukong hides plenty of mysteries, but not all of its secrets and mechanics are easy to figure out. That's why we've compiled a list of how-to guides to help you figure out everything from upgrading your healing to finding secret areas, and unlocking special bosses
